description.value:
Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increases by 1

Warder's Intuition. Whenever you make an Intelligence (Investigation) check or an Ability Check involving @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-items.HWphIyqLmXJ56fRh]{Thieves' Tools}, you can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the total ability check.

Wards and Seals. You can cast the @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.T6nNBhzyjOKZ0ueS]{Alarm} and @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.ZttvQx25TMC1Unxx]{Mage Armor} spells with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast the @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.L6kpNwPGuT0Viiip]{Arcane Lock} spell with it. Once you cast either spell with this trait, you can't cast that spell again until you finish a Long Rest. Intelligence is your Spellcasting Ability for these spells, and you don't require material components when you cast them with this trait.

Spells of the Mark. If you have the Spellcasting or Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Warding Spells table are added to the spell list of your Spellcasting class.

Mark of Warding Spells

Spell Level Spells
1st @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.T6nNBhzyjOKZ0ueS]{Alarm}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.g2B1luNF1dvQGWgA]{Armor of Agathys}
2nd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.L6kpNwPGuT0Viiip]{Arcane Lock}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.nsoDykkZYdD4AiSr]{Knock}
3rd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.kxzbQbqn423b53oz]{Glyph of Warding}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.8ridDHmAG0aBsugg]{Magic Circle}
4th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.gtx27BxxdA4bkcTM]{Leomund's Secret Chest}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.XWSubhualg7jVUGJ]{Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound}
5th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.iusFRYv0kuzXVDmg]{Antilife Shell}

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
